categories: Category:The Star Wars Sourcebook narrative fiction

nodes.text: Song for a Fallen Nomad is a short narrative appearing in The Star Wars Sourcebook, reprinted in the Star Wars Sourcebook second edition, written by Bill Slavicsek and Curtis Smith. The story details the exploits of young Tatooine moisture farmer Wenny Boggs as he encounters a Tusken Raider mourning the death of an elder.
